content: get your grannys in a row with this colorful crochet blanket stitched in red heart all in one granny square you ll do double_crochet chains single_crochet double_crochet 2 together single_crochet 2 together and assembly techniques while the yarn takes care of all the colorwork bringing a wonderful nostalgic feel to your project this throw is perfect for today s modern homes materials red heart® all in one granny square™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m pop culture 2029 7 balls or 2675 yds/2446 m gauges 12 double_crochet and 8 row = 4 10 cm motif = 6 15 cm square measurements approx 50 x 65 127 x 165 cm
